name: Fix for 'Diary Of An x264 Developer' blog
description: "Diary Of An x264 Developer" (x264dev.multimedia.cx) may make your eyes bleed. If this is the case, do yourself a favor and install this quick fix. This will change out the horrid blue background with a black background and darken the text color. If this still makes your eyes bleed like a sawed off leg, you ought to modify this style's css.
